about_the_game:
The "Stunt Dog Adventure" is a thrilling retro inspired 2D side scrolling action game. Collect bones, solve puzzles, swim and fly to rescue a team of kidnapped All-Star Stunt Dogs!

SURVIVE THE ELEMENTS

Battle the elements as you adventure through rain, lightning storms, high winds, sandstorms and snow!

HAND-CRAFTED LEVELS

Each level has been skillfully hand crafted to provide hours of fun for gamers of all skill levels from Novice to Advanced. There are three difficulty levels to master.

UNDERWATER ADVENTURES

Get ready to hold your breath and swim underwater to collect bones and power-ups.

DOG-GONE FUN BOSS FIGHTS

The no good dog catcher "Cory Durzo" and his evil army of cats have kidnapped the "All-Star Stunt Dogs"! Can you help "Diggy the Dog" rescue them all before it's too late?

EAT BONES TO STAY ALIVE

Collect and eat as many bones as you can to keep your health up and score more points.

SPECIAL ABILITIES

Collect 6 unique dog collars with special abilities to save the day. Soar with a super hero cape, shoot tennis balls, fly a helicopter and more!

BONUS LEVELS

Keep your eye out for hidden tunnels that lead to special bonus levels for higher score!

INSPIRED BY REAL LIFE RESCUE DOGS FROM AMERICA'S FAVORITE "All-STAR STUNT DOG SHOW!"

The "Stunt Dog Adventure" is a thrilling retro inspired 2D side scrolling action game. Collect bones, solve puzzles, swim and fly to rescue a team of kidnapped All-Star Stunt Dogs!

SURVIVE THE ELEMENTS

Battle the elements as you adventure through rain, lightning storms, high winds, sandstorms and snow!

HAND-CRAFTED LEVELS

Each level has been skillfully hand crafted to provide hours of fun for gamers of all skill levels from Novice to Advanced. There are three difficulty levels to master.

UNDERWATER ADVENTURES

Get ready to hold your breath and swim underwater to collect bones and power-ups.

DOG-GONE FUN BOSS FIGHTS

The no good dog catcher "Cory Durzo" and his evil army of cats have kidnapped the "All-Star Stunt Dogs"! Can you help "Diggy the Dog" rescue them all before it's too late?

EAT BONES TO STAY ALIVE

Collect and eat as many bones as you can to keep your health up and score more points.

Collect 6 unique dog collars with special abilities to save the day. Soar with a super hero cape, shoot tennis balls, fly a helicopter and more!

name: Stunt Dog Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.4GHZ or Faster
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 capable
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 1.4GHZ or Faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo
  • VR Support: N/A

reviews:
“Stunt Dog Adventure: A Pawsitively Fantastic Journey! As you step into the paws of Diggy the Super Dog, you’re immediately immersed in a whimsical world that combines nostalgia with modern gameplay mechanics and is a must-play for platforming enthusiasts and dog lovers alike!”
10 – Stunt Dog Show Productions
short_description: Star as "Diggy the Super Dog" in the Stunt Dog Adventure! Rescue the All-Star Stunt Dogs through hand-crafted levels, solve puzzles, battle bosses while braving the weather. Collect bones, master abilities, fly, and swim in this retro 2D platformer!
